data.name: Fibonacci has lost his marbles!
data.description:
Fibonacci has lost his marbles! A number in his sequence is incorrect, can you find it for him?

The Fibonacci sequence is the sequence 1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13, 21...

If you hadn't noticed, each new number is the sum of the two before: 

1 + 1 = 2 

1 + 2 = 3

2 + 3 = 5

3 + 5 = 8

And so on...
Which starts with 1, 1


Complete the function so that for any section of the Fibonacci sequence given, the incorrect number is returned


You will be given an array with elements of the sequence in order at random sections of the sequence, this array will never be empty (at least length 4) and only 1 inccorect number will be in it

The incorrect number will replace the number that should have been there

For example

[3, 5, 8, 17, 21]  
Should return 17 as 13 should be there instead

[21, 3, 5, 8, 13]  
Should return 21 as 2 should be there instead
